title: The Learjet 45 bleed air system is supplied by the two engin…
caption_en: The Learjet 45 bleed air system is supplied by the two engines and the auxiliary power unit (APU). A single engine is capable of providing all the bleed air needs. The bleed air system is controlled by the bleed switches on the pressurisation control panel

title: Cabin Pressurization Controller This is located at the forwa…
caption_en: Cabin Pressurization Controller This is located at the forward instrument panel, just in front of the co-pilot. The switches associated with the pneumatic system are the Left BLEED, Right BLEED and the APU BLEED.

title: Throughout this lesson, we will use this schematic of the ai…
caption_en: Throughout this lesson, we will use this schematic of the aircraft pneumatic system to show the bleed airflow.
